programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: A special preview of the newest season of Resident Alien before it crash lands on USA & SYFY.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 4
programme.desc: With the price on his head ever increasing, legendary hit man John Wick takes his fight against the High Table global as he seeks out the most powerful players in the underworld, from New York to Paris to Japan to Berlin.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Experts seek answers to a young businesswoman's death just before she was to testify in a criminal trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler's investigation into a sexual abuse case goes awry when their wealthy suspect involves his lawyer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson seek a connection between two men who are beaten and branded with a wire hanger in seemingly separate incidents.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl at Detective Stabler's daughter's school accuses another student of rape; ADA Paxton (Christine Lahti) returns to prosecute.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A famous TV host (Roger Bart) forces himself on the young author (Anna Chlumsky) of an erotic novel; Detective Amaro uncovers a secret that could damage the author's career and her case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman claims that Brian Cassidy (Dean Winters) raped her while he was working under cover; when Cassidy and his lawyer utilize surprising defense methods, Detective Amaro is affected.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A popular sports reporter (Lauren Cohan) accuses a cameraman (David Marciano) of rape and stalking; when the victim learns she is pregnant as a result of the rape, the defense employs controversial tactics in hope of gaining favor with the jury.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a concert turns into a mob scene, a teenager is brutally assaulted; Detective Amaro ends up defending the prime suspect's reputation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: ADA Barba finds that a friend (Kirk Acevedo) -- with a connection to a mayoral candidate frontrunner -- is accused of rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A military officer who was gang raped refuses to cooperate with the SVU for fear of damage to her reputation; Amaro asks his ex to help dig up information on the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Rollins tries to help a friend press rape charges against her lover, she finds herself thrust into the middle of the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A college student becomes a target after her work as an online porn star is discovered by her classmates.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A feud between a famous author (Robert Vaughn) and his sixth wife, Charmaine (Marcia Cross), turns into a criminal case when Charmaine is faced with allegations of abuse; Barba winds up dealing with family drama of his own.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The futures of two high-school students are complicated by a murky date-rape case filled with dueling accusations.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman is followed home and raped outside of her building, neighbors witness the crime but neglect to call for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man under investigation for rape and murder threatens to expose the secrets of those who are working on the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates when a woman claims a charismatic spiritual healer used hypnosis to incapacitate her and assault her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a female pundit is assaulted during a protest, Benson and Barba struggle to put their political beliefs aside to help bring the attacker to justice.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an infant goes missing, members of the SVU find themselves taking sides in a family's right-to-die court case; Barba's interference in the case puts the entire DA's office in jeopardy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad spends New Year's Eve tracking down an Amber Alert, and Carisi faces off against counselor Rafael Barba in an emotional courtroom battle.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: Armed with the knowledge of his wayward client's identity, the Jackal tracks him down in Munich, determined to settle the score.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi tries Richard Wheatley for the murder of Kathy Stabler; Benson finds herself at odds with a friend when Barba agrees to take the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU provides help and protection for a longtime domestic violence victim, but when she winds up at the defendant's table in court, Rollins surprises Carisi with a formidable opponent at trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: ADA Barba finds that a friend (Kirk Acevedo) -- with a connection to a mayoral candidate frontrunner -- is accused of rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A famous TV host (Roger Bart) forces himself on the young author (Anna Chlumsky) of an erotic novel; Detective Amaro uncovers a secret that could damage the author's career and her case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman claims that Brian Cassidy (Dean Winters) raped her while he was working under cover; when Cassidy and his lawyer utilize surprising defense methods, Detective Amaro is affected.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A popular sports reporter (Lauren Cohan) accuses a cameraman (David Marciano) of rape and stalking; when the victim learns she is pregnant as a result of the rape, the defense employs controversial tactics in hope of gaining favor with the jury.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a concert turns into a mob scene, a teenager is brutally assaulted; Detective Amaro ends up defending the prime suspect's reputation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the investigation into a missing teen leads the detectives to a severed leg, they are drawn into the world of self-mutilation and ritual amputation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team must proceed with caution when an underage escort is found dead at a wild bachelor party with high-profile people in attendance; Brian Cassidy (Dean Winters), a former SVU detective who is working under, helps Benson and Amaro investigate.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad reels from the fallout of Capt. Cragen being arrested for the murder of an escort.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into Capt. Cragen and two warring escort services continues; Brian Cassidy's undercover work becomes increasingly difficult; Amaro struggles with the case and his marriage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The special victims squad tries to take down a sex-trafficking operation that enslaves young women; when the investigation is halted by Lt. Alexandra Eames (Kathryn Erbe), Detective Benson has to get creative.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The kidnapping of a young boy reminds Cragen, Munch and Benson of an unsolved case from 13 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the detectives investigate reports of sexual abuse at an elite private school, decades of secrets are exposed.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Holiday celebrations are interrupted when Detective Tutuola's ex-brother-in-law is arrested for attacking a priest; during the investigation, a church scandal is uncovered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a rape victim is arrested for murder in Suffolk County, Detective Benson questions the case and finds enough evidence for District Attorney Barba to charge a different suspect in Manhattan.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives go under cover to arrest a man who brutally attacks other men; a deceptively tough defense attorney (Nia Vardalos) complicates ADA Barba's case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young boy is found alone in Central Park, the search for his parents leads to evidence of a planned mass-casualty event in the city; the SVU works with the joint-terrorism task force to identify the suspects and the motive.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: One day after a convicted rapist is exonerated by DNA evidence, a shocking new crime forces Fin and the team to search for the whereabouts of the man again.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a man uses a false identity to lure a vulnerable married woman to bed, Barba thinks the evidence amounts to rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A sexually assaulted athlete's secret double life could destroy her Olympic career and ruin the case against her attacker; Rollins' sister is released from prison on parole.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a sergeant's son is accused of rape, Benson is put in a difficult position and forced to make a choice between loyalty and duty.
